countFn.description: Custom counting function that overrides default behaviour.

hideCount.description: Whether segment count should be hidden. Defaults to 'false'.

progressAriaLabel.description: Aria label attribute for active segment's progress element. Defaults to 'progress'.

segmented.description: Whether tracker is in segmented mode. Defaults to true.

separator.description: Separator between count text and segment label. Applicable only to non-vertical mode. Defaults to '-'.

vertical.description: Whether tracker is in vertical mode. Defaults to false.

calculateCount.description: Calculates count text of the segment.

stateChanged.description: Marks the component to be change detected.
